summary: A single element that significantly differs in tone or style can disrupt the overall harmony and emotional impact of a cohesive collection.
When expectations are set high based on consistent quality, any deviation can lead to disappointment and disrupt the anticipated experience.
Maintaining a consistent artistic vision is crucial for preserving the authenticity and emotional resonance of creative work.
Consistency in tone and style is essential in creating a unified and immersive experience for an audience.
